All Classes

Class Description
AccountDetails  
AccountDetailsRepository
This repository represents the detailed information of an account.
Booking
This is our main class - Every action that is made from an employee or customer will interact with this class.
Booking.BookingType  
BookingRepository
This repository represents the detailed information of a booking.
BookingRequest
class to store the requierements of a booking that will be stored in an ArrayList for processing by employee
BookingRequest.BookingType  
BookingRequestRepository  
ConferenceRoom
The class Conferenceroom extends the Room Class and its methods It is used to specify the Room as a ConferenceRoom and sets its specific attributes like the price per hour.
ConferenceRoomBooking
This class extends the Booking to the kind of room that has been booked, in this case to a conferenceRoom
ConferenceRoomBookingRepository
This repository specifies the booking for a conference room a little further.
ConferenceRoomRepository
This repository represents the detailed specified information of an conferenceRoom.
ContactData
object to store personal data of customer
ContactDataRepository
This repository represents the ContactData.
Customer
customer class manages every methode done by the customer and its personal data
Customer.PaymentMethod  
CustomerRepository
This repository represents the Customer.
Employee
This is the main actor in our application for now.
EmployeeRepository
This repository holds information on the employee.
HotelRoom
The class HotelRoom extends the Room Class and its methods It is used to specify the Room as a Hotelroom and sets its specific attributes like the price per night Since you cannot create an instance of the Room-class itself the employee can only create instances of the Hotelroom or the ConferenceRoom instead.
HotelRoomBooking
This class extends the Booking to the kind of room that has been booked, in this case to a Hotelroom.
HotelRoomBookingRepository
This repository specifies the booking for a hotel room a little further.
HotelRoomRepository
This repository represents the detailed specified information of an hotelroom.
Role
This class implements an early version of a right management system.
RoleRepository
Represents the roles within the roommanager.
Room
The class room holds all vital information of the rooms, its size, its category and roomnumber, i can also tell whether a room is occupied or not.
Room.Category  
Room.RoomType  
RoommanagerApplication  
RoomRepository
This repository represents the detailed specified information of an room.
